argumentText:
ARGUMENT
e t

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrsval.v | |- V = ( mVR ` T ) |
| 2 |  | mvrsval.e | |- E = ( mEx ` T ) |
| 3 |  | mvrsval.w | |- W = ( mVars ` T ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elfvex | |- ( X e. ( mEx ` T ) -> T e. _V ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_eleq2s | |- ( X e. E -> T e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( t = T -> ( mEx ` t ) = ( mEx ` T ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( t = T -> ( mEx ` t ) = E ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( t = T -> ( mVR ` t ) = ( mVR ` T ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( t = T -> ( mVR ` t ) = V ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ineq2d | |- ( t = T -> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i ( mVR ` t ) ) = ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( t = T -> ( e e. ( mEx ` t ) |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i ( mVR ` t ) ) ) = ( e e. E |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-mvrs | |- mVars = ( t e. _V |-> ( e e. ( mEx ` t ) |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i ( mVR ` t ) ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( mEx ` T ) e. _V |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_eqeltri | |- E e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_mptex | |- ( e e. E |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) ) e. _V |
| 16 | 11, 12, 15 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( T e. _V -> ( mVars ` T ) = ( e e. E |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) ) ) |
| 17 | 5, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( X e. E -> ( mVars ` T ) = ( e e. E |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) ) ) |
| 18 | 3, 17 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( X e. E -> W = ( e e. E |-> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( e = X -> ( 2nd ` e ) = ( 2nd ` X ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_rneqd | |- ( e = X -> ran ( 2nd ` e ) = ran ( 2nd ` X ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_ineq1d | |- ( e = X -> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) = ( ran ( 2nd ` X ) i^i V ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( X e. E /\ e = X ) -> ( ran ( 2nd ` e ) i^i V ) = ( ran ( 2nd ` X ) i^i V ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_id | |- ( X e. E -> X e. E ) |
| 24 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 2nd ` X ) e. _V |
| 25 | 24 | #P_rnex | |- ran ( 2nd ` X ) e. _V |
| 26 | 25 | #P_inex1 | |- ( ran ( 2nd ` X ) i^i V ) e. _V |
| 27 | 26 | #P_a1i | |- ( X e. E -> ( ran ( 2nd ` X ) i^i V ) e. _V ) |
| 28 | 18, 22, 23, 27 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( X e. E -> ( W ` X ) = ( ran ( 2nd ` X ) i^i V ) ) |
